description: This file defines React functional components for UI elements, specifically toggle buttons and tab controls for a demo interface, facilitating accessible switching between 'Preview' and 'Code' views, including HTML and JavaScript code tabs.

methods.name: TabToggle({ value, onChange, idBase = 'preview-code' })
methods.description: A toggle component that switches between 'Preview' and 'Code', accessible with focus-visible rings and proper ARIA attributes.

methods.name: CodeTabs({ html, js, renderBlock, idBase = 'code-tabs' })
methods.description: A tabbed interface component that allows users to switch between HTML and JS code views, with each tab rendering a code block via a provided renderBlock function.

ctags.name: CodeTabs
ctags.pattern: /^export function CodeTabs({ html, js, renderBlock, idBase = 'code-tabs' }) {$/
